title: A.I. Today
description: A.I. Today app is not a simple news/weather app. I wanted to create an A.I. experience with users by adding emotion and conscience to this app.
feature: The most reliable and up-to-date news about A.I.
Lets you know whether the news is good or bad using Sentiment Analysis
Current weather all around the world
Lets you know whether the weather is good or bad based on historic weather temperature in the same location and weather condition

title: WSJ Education
description: The Wall Street Journal's new look Education site for college students and college professors.

title: Dow Jones DNA: Data-Driven Business
description: Landing page created for Dow Jones DNA with completely controlled form components in React.js.

title: Vipervizion v.2019
description: Single-Page App (SPA) for my portfolio written in React.js v.16.6
feature: Code splitting components using React's latest features, lazy & Suspense (React 16.6)
Context API to control state management (React 16)
Dynamically generates contents from JSON-based API request

title: React/Redux Real-Time News Feed
description: Real-time news feed app built in React.js and Redux.js
feature: Auto-populating real-time news feed for 4 different topics from API request
Code splitting components using React's latest features, lazy & Suspense (React 16.6)

title: Holiday Chill
description: Deutsch Inc. asked me to build Amazon's Alexa app for holiday season to give out Echo Dots to their clients and employees. I created several prototypes prior to build this public skill. It was very challenging since Alexa SDK was new (then and still) and there was not enough/solid documents but thanks to my favorite language, `Node.js` which helped me write back-end successfully. One month later, the same app was published in Google Assistant for Google Home device.
feature: Meditation with Jack Frost for about 20 min
Listen to the sound of winter for relaxation and stress-free time

title: HGTV Valspar Paint
description: Created an Amazon's Alexa skill for HGTV+Valspar Paint pitch purpose. This skill is mainly designed for Echo Show device with Node.js & Alexa SDK that includes many user interactive features.
feature: Voice command to help you choose the right paint product for you

title: Barron's Shop Page
description: One of Dow Jones & Company's weekly newspaper/magazine, Barron's online shop page to provide print and digital copy.

title: WSJ Future of Everything Festival 2018
description: The Wall Street Journal's annual festival site built in WordPress.

title: Holiday Chill Landing Page
description: Landing page that describes how to install, enable and use Alexa app, Holiday Chill created by Deutsch Inc.
